section.title: Pre-Install Requirements and Prerequisites
section.para: Ensure that the following requirements have been met before continuing with the install.

listitem.para: Once unzipped, the JAIN SLEE binary release requires at least 300MB of free disk space. Keep in mind that disk space requirements may change from release to release.

varlistentry.term: Anything Java Itself Will Run On

listitem.para: The &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE container, and bundled JAIN SLEE components are 100% java. The JAIN SLEE will run on the same hardware that the &JEE.PLATFORM; runs on, but it is recommended at least 2GB or 4GB of RAM memory, for 32 or 64 bit Operating Systems.

A working installation of the Java Development Kit (JDK) version 6 is required in order to run the &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE. Note that the &JEE.PLATFORM; is a runtime dependency, but comes bundled with the binary distribution.
For instructions on how to install the JDK, refer to .

section.title: Uninstall &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE
section.para: To uninstall simply delete the directory containing &THIS.PLATFORM; JAIN SLEE.
